title: News24.com | Stranded in Japan: Joburg family living on minute noodles as SA lockdown continues
description: A dream holiday to see the cherry blossoms in Japan turned into a nightmare for a South African family who are now stranded in East Asia.
content:
A dream holiday to see the cherry blossoms in Japan turned into a nightmare for a South African family who are now stranded in East Asia.
“We have run out of medication and the cost of living in Japan is far too great for our weak South African Rand. Minute … [+3912 chars]
